attributes.action: put pressure on BBC Wales to start producing some decent comedy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The sum total of this organisation's comedy output is the awful "High Hopes" with it's puerile valleys humour and bizarre social messages.  BBC Wales spent hundreds of thousands of pounds on some TV film with Nerys Hughes that is supposedly unbroadcastable and also a sketch show written by Boyd Clack that again has failed to be screened even at 2am on BBC 4.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
